storyInfo: The battle between the Blood Knight and Nightmare Knight burns white-hot. Monique, the assassin with her sights set on Rhodes Island, is intercepted by Shining. Shining and Monique make a wager on three arrows, and Nightmare Knight falls just one step short, defeated by the Blood Knight.

attributes.content: Good news, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has approved Rhodes Island's applications. 'It's necessary for our valued partners to visit the city.'
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If none of these things happened in the first place, you would've been able to enjoy the Grand Knight Territory more freely.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor, were you looking for me?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Gravel! I still have some healthy food leftovers. Want to take them with you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Good day, Gravel, Doctor.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.options: We rarely get a chance to visit the other parts of Kazimierz.;Want to take a look around?;It

attributes.content: Wh-What a battle! I can hardly believe my eyes!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Actually, I should be talking our unknown Nightzmora! Can you believe this is his first Major appearance, and he's holding his own against a champion?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The clash of blood-red armor on the field tonight will eclipse the moon!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The audience is definitely feeling it too! Tola, 'Scourge of the Prairie,' Nightmare Knight! His crazed determination is addictive and intoxicating!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Nightmare Knight's been surging in the polls since his duel with the Radiant Knight! Will he add another page to this story?! A rise to grand knighthood?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: By the way, Ancients Entertainment is holding a 'Knightly Title Trivia Game!' Guess the knightly titles and win fabulous prizes!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Where'd your bravado go, Nightzmora?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Minoan, in the times when my ancestors flayed the land, your heroes had all become naught but words on the lips of poets.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You waste your breath.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Where's your Khagan now? What happened to those proud kinsmen of yours?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: One who lives in a bygone nightmare is a pitiful man indeed.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Minoan, Infected. What are you fighting for?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Survival.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: They made me the hero of the Infected... They enshrined me in the annals of history. But I just wanted to survive.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The hero of the Infected?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I see... Do you not also fight for your people?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: My people...? No. We don't share the same bloodline, nor were we born in the same place. We are just unfortunate enough to suffer the same disease.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I pitied their plight, so I went to deliver them, to find a way out for them.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You say they're not your people... But you still want to save them...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Laughable.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You are mighty, without a doubt. But, have the prairies of Kazimierz been carved up by the Infected and foreigners?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The Kazimierzians, the Kuranta... Where are they?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Did I cross thousands of miles to the country of knights, only to fight against the Infected, Minoans, and my own kinsmen?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ––A sick joke!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Woaaaahh... S-So, this is Kazimierz's commercial hub?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Strictly speaking, this is just one of hundreds of commercial centers across the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I recommended this particular one because it's close.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But there's way too much junk food everywhere! Just one look around and I count three popcorn stands, two pizzerias, and four burger shops!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: This is unacceptable!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Haha... Is this because there's a competition venue nearby?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course. The arena lies at the heart of every center of commerce.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: All businesses revolve around the knights' glorious blood sport. It's the way things are done here.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Is this... a Nearl doll?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Aww! It's so cute!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wait a minute, this shop... Is it all dedicated to...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yo! Are you folks fans of the Radiant Knight too?
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Then, you've come to the right place! This is a specialty store for everything Radiant Knight! Clay figurines, plush dolls, Nearl family crests – you name it, we've got it!
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: By the way, if the Radiant Knight manages to defeat the Wind Knight and advance to the finals, our supplier is considering making exclusive commemorative medals from refined Originium! Want to put in a pre-order?
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I mean, the Radiant Knight's pretty much sure to win! Hahaha!
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.options: (Buy the doll for Nightingale.);(Ask how much the pre-order is.);(Rhetorically ask if the store would consider a shield used by the Radiant Knight its greatest treasure.)

attributes.content: Thanks for your patronage!
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, uh... You only have foreign money? Lungmen Dollars? Err, you'll have to go to the bank first.
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Let me do the conversion for you real quick... That should be about 1.3 million LMD?
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: A shield? Since when did the Radiant Knight use a shield?
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: But we have warhammers, double-bladed swords, and even the latest model of swordspears. Want to take a look?
attributes.name: A Shopkeeper

attributes.content: It's hard to tell what's going on! Nightmare Knight's ferocious attack was again repelled by the Blood Knight, and the former champion is slicing through the artificial turf as if it was tofu!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's already been ten minutes, but the tempestuous exchange of blows continues! Who will be the first to show signs of fatigue in this seemingly endless battle?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––As I speak, the champion is readying his Arts again! He evades a sweeping strike from his opponent!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: After all that, are the two sides only feeling each other out?! Neither the champion nor the Nightzmora seems to want to take the initiative and cast the first Arts––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Minoan, how did you learn to fight like this?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I had very little combat training before becoming a knight.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: It was only after that I learned as I fought.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ...A born warrior.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Young man.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: I am not your mentor. But, if it is an opponent you seek, there is one thing I can teach you.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The fear you seek to instill through bluffing means nothing to someone who lives only in the present.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight takes a half-step back.
Fresh blood oozes from his armor, condensing into a stream around him.
A crimson light wraps around his weapon, forging it into a lethal edge of judgment.
Answer me, Nightzmora. In the history you dreamt, in the thousands of years between then and now––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Were the Infected ever given a new lease on life?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Why you...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You call yourself a Kheshig? Then don't back down now, Nightzmora!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Where is your Khagan now? Bring him to me!
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Where is your Khagan?
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: Where is your Khagan?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Thousands of years have passed since the Khagan stepped into history.
You'll only find him in history books, boy.
Kheshigs? They were the Khagan's attendants, the greatest warriors known to this world.
The Khagan conquered many places, but in doing so, did a lot of things that hurt people.
It is in the nature of the Nightzmora to spread fear, and the desire to conquer was practically sustenance for the Khagan.
But, Tola.
You were born into this world, and you will surely find your own––
...Father, rival, master, ideals.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Was I actually... looking for these things in this city?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No! It is time to wake up from my dream.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This will just be a lingering memory. The path I drew for my Khaganquest was set in stone a long time ago.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.text: The young hunter sets out on his Khaganquest ♪
From dreams he goes, towards the shores of gold ♪
A Nightzmora stands in the arena.
His limbs are at ease. His flaws are exposed. He knows not where to cast his gaze from beneath that helmet.
Until the black night paints over his vision ♪ Until a tower of bone stands erect in his heart ♪
Until hemlock chokes his hazy home ♪

attributes.content: Done saying your prayers?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: My family is dead. My people are lost.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ––The Khagan is wherever the tip of my blade points.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ––am my own Khagan!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Come!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Clear weather. No wind. A fine day for shooting.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Targets: the two leaders of Rhodes Island - one hooded person of unknown race, and one Cautus.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Mood... Very bad. Because every time I try to do my work, someone gets in my way.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Addendum. Extremely bad mood.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Do you have a habit of keeping a diary?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Who would deliberately write these things down? Might as well send it to the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi Kazimierz and ask for a speedier sentence.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: By the looks of things, you're the type of person who brings her baggage with her to work.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Confessarius, the Radiant Knight, and that Cautus who gives off strange vibes.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What the hell is Rhodes Island supposed to be anyway?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I never had a chance to ask you before, but... You people...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Where did you hear the name 'Confessarius'?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Monique has seen the skills of the Sarkaz before her.
Excellent swordsmanship. Complex, seemingly incomprehensible Originium Arts - perhaps witchcraft. Along with the Radiant Knight, she was able to block a Darksteel arrow.
She had a suspicion at the time, that perhaps... 'blocking arrows' was not the full extent of the Sarkaz's abilities.
But now, she is convinced of one thing.
...I can't tell you that.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'm also not so kind-hearted that I can just watch an assassin take aim at the Doctor and Amiya, and then let her walk free.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Besides, the last time we met, we didn't get a chance to introduce ourselves properly. A bit rude on both our parts.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: An aura...?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Why are all of the Radiant Knight's buddies so shiny and sparkly? I'm getting tired of that aesthetic.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: (It's a comforting glow... Almost no hints of aggression... Is this Sarkaz witchcraft?)
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: (Her expression... Does she lament drawing her sword?)
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Not in the mood to chat?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Very well then. Let's find out just what you're worth.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Wh-What just happened...?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Are my eyes playing tricks on me? A black mist is rising from the arena – While that isn't too unusual, do you see something rising from the mist?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Is that... a banner? Wait, that's... an entire army?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Is that... the product of your obsession?
attributes.name: The Radiant Knight

attributes.content: A shame...
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A shame that those knights watching from the stands cannot fathom how I how I feel right now.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The flag flutters, the horn sounds, an army marches... An entire people, an entire history.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ––is this the reason you've given up the present, to seek out death like a madman?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ––Hraaaagh!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The Nightzmora knight launched an attack! B-But with the thick black mist enveloping the arena, I can't see what's going on!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Is that something charging forward inside the mist?! Is this Nightmare Knight's true Arts? The ability to summon his ancestors?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ridiculous.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You lack the courage to face your fate.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight brings down his axe. He knows he is not facing an ancient Kheshig army.
A young man who seeks his own annihilation.
A young man who tries to bring back a bygone era.
The jet-black mist drowns the sanguine armor of the Blood Knight.
From the impact, from the pain, it is clear that the summoned entities are not illusions or holograms.
The Blood Knight continues to stand motionless. He is waiting. Waiting for the moment when the real Nightzmora will strike.
(Ancient language) Sleep now, hero!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight lets out a grunt.
Even Kazimierz's strongest armor wails in this moment.
Blade cleaves through armor, and even the sturdy Blood Knight is almost forced to take a knee.
Damn... Only a flesh wound?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You were able to cut me.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: But my blood is now on your weapon.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: (A trap––?!)
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Don't feel bad. Your lack of combat experience has always been your weakness.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: You are still a far cry from the so-called 'Kheshig.'
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: The sight of you and the Radiant Knight blocking Darksteel's arrow made a deep impression. Even a Silverlance Pegasus would have trouble withstanding Darksteel's punishment.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: My sources tell me you and the Radiant Knight call yourselves the 'Followers,' an organization that treats the Infected.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: A 'physician,' huh? Looks like I need to toss that informant of mine into the gloompincer cage.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I'm not fond of fighting.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I used to be in the Victorian army.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Because I was just a commoner without noble blood, I couldn't become an officer. The K.G.C.C. ended up poaching me during a joint military exercise.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: At that time, my old bosses were still rejoicing over one fewer thorn in their sides.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: So, I'm quite confident in my aim.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: From this distance, take three of my arrows head on, and I'll drop my plans for Rhodes Island. Deal?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Why should I trust you?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Whether or not you do is up to you. The Armorless Union has no shortage of ways to deal with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: For example, we could've applied some volatile chemicals to those dolls that they're clutching so unsuspectingly right now...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Don't give me that look. Anyone could arrange something like that.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Three shots.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Three shots.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: (Exhales) ...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Number one.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Monique draws her bowstring. A picture-perfect Victorian form.
Back in her military days, the young Monique could pierce a willow branch at a hundred paces. She was famous for it.
Didn't draw enough for that one.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Sarkaz before her didn't even draw her sword.
The unexpected result sends a stifling heat through Monique's chest, the unwanted sensation rushes toward her heart.
Number two.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: She draws her bow taut a second time.
On a rainy night, Monique once attacked a first-order campaign knight.
The opponent was not some famous hero, but a true veteran of the Ursus-Kazimierz War.
His quick reflexes spared him the arrow from the darkness, and the two ended up locked in combat until they plunged off a cliff.
The forests of Kazimierz were cold and steep in the early spring, and the chase through the dense woods lasted seven days and nights.
At the moment when the pain in her limbs and the ringing in her ears were almost intolerable, she drew her bowstring back and nocked her arrow once more, finding her target as he stopped for water.
Her stance changed, as has the look in her eyes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Like a hunter, waiting for an opening.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The arrow split in two in midair.
One segment embedded itself into the ground. The other disappeared into a grassy clearing, where it startled a few chattering fowlbeasts.
But I have no intention of becoming your prey.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Are all Confessarii all as skilled with the sword as you?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Or rather, are there a lot of other people at Rhodes Island like you?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: (Should we redo Rhodes Island's risk assessment?)
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: To be honest, getting rid of Rhodes Island should be the responsibility of the Board.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: But soon enough, I won't be acting on their orders.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You don't believe me?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: No... Actually, that doesn't come as a surprise.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Our leader has also foreseen this possibility.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: So what's the point of you saying this? That this duel is solely a matter of your pride?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The point is... You should give this everything you've got, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Last one.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: ...Nngh!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: It's over.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: A stunning reversal! In a single heavy blow, the Blood Knight has dissipated the heavy mist lingering in the arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: His momentum sweeps right through Nightmare Knight's illusions!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Too bad for you, Nightzmora! You made one miscalculation! In the face of the Blood Knight and his mastery of Blood Arts, you underestimated his skills in a melee!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Was that really an illusion? It seemed like... an entire war.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Graaaah.... Ahhhhh! Arrrrrrghh!!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What?! Even after taking that tremendous blow at point-blank range, Nightmare Knight is still standing?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Unbelievable! Could he be mustering a counterattack–?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ––As the Blood Knight, I would like to put in a request to speak with the judges.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Yes, he has lost his senses. Should we continue this, his life will be in danger. Let's call this match.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: ––The judges have reached a verdict! Without a doubt, the first knight to advance to the finals of the Major has been decided!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The clash between the Nightzmora and the champion has ended! A battle between fear and terror incarnate! I have the results right here––!!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It is my great honor to announce the winner of tonight's round––
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Before Mob can finish announcing the winner's name, from behind a conspicuous barrier in the corner of the arena....
A certain Infected knight stands up.
The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight A

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight B

attributes.content: They're all... Infected?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Blood Knight has won! Long live the Blood Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Spectating Infected

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Spectating Infected

attributes.text: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
The Blood Knight slowly lifts his hand and gestures to the audience.
He then turns his head to look at the Nightzmora who has still not fallen.
As the Blood Knight lifts his eyes above the Nightzmora, his gaze meets that of another knight in the distance.
The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
Umm...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (The professional thing would be to not interrupt the audience when they're in an uproar, but most of them seem like they're Infected... so maybe it's fine?)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: This is the hero of Kazimierz's Infected, Margaret.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You strive to fulfill a similar role. How will you deal with this overlap?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: This is the Infected... Dikaiopolis.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: So that's the hero, the Blood Knight. So much fanfare for that name.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Though the Radiant Knight is a paragon of defiance, the one who truly managed to carve out a space for the Infected... is the Blood Knight, Dikaiopolis.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But... it has been a long time since he bowed his head to us.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: In my capacity as a media man, I deeply appreciate your proposal, Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But as you know, this... public opinion, is just a thin layer of assurance. To make sure things go smoothly, we'll have to prepare to play hardball.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I just don't want everyone to end up... with no way back.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The Blood Knight! The Blood Knight won!
attributes.name: An Enthusiastic Spectator

attributes.content: Ahaha! I knew the Blood Knight was invincible! Nobody can take him down!
attributes.name: An Enthusiastic Spectator

attributes.content: Oh, what's going on over there?
attributes.name: An Enthusiastic Spectator

attributes.content: The roof over there... is it sunrise?
attributes.name: An Enthusiastic Spectator

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The Sarkaz slowly closes her eyes, as if refusing to view her Arts.
A brief brilliance lingers on the tip of her sword, like the setting sun.
As if she suddenly remembered something, the Sarkaz quickly changes her pose, bringing the sword into her embrace.
As if this sword never should be unsheathed.
What... did you do just now...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Was that Sarkaz witchcraft? No, what I felt just now was...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The breath of life? No. A soul's lifeforce? No.
It was more like a formless illusion, something that could only be touched while in a trance or a drunken stupor.
But there is no doubt that just now, the Sarkaz... was wielding the twilight.
Grr...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: That technique... You...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You could've killed me!
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I was just taking your three shots, Armorless.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Of course, if you go back on your word, I will.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The feeling of being caught.
She can't run. She would be chased down... But by what? By that Sarkaz? Or her sword?
Or by the thing she controls... the essence of life?
Do you want to continue?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Even on the job, we still fulfill our obligations.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Pull out. Stop tailing Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I have one more, kind of trivial question for you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'll consider it, out of respect for you keeping your word.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: For you Sarkaz, is there some kind of significance... to cutting off your horns?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It differs from person to person. Some may see their Sarkaz heritage as a curse, and may do that as a way of trying to hide their identity.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It might also be a way to channel a certain form of witchcraft, to a facilitate a certain Arts.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Or perhaps... it might even be a tradition of some unconventional tribes. The possibilities are many, and there's no way to say for sure.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...No, no reason.
attributes.name: Monique
